U

UNGUESSED - Enum constant in enum class Utils.GUESS_STATUS
 
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class View.MineSweeper
Updates the view with the new board state, including calling game-over messages if the game has ended.
updateCount(MineSweeperTile[][]) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperTile
Counts up tiles which are adjacent to this one, and adds one to the mineCount variable each time one of them contains a mine.
updateTilesAround(int, int) - Method in class Controllers.MineSweeperController
When the user clicks a tile, this method updates all of the tiles around it.
updateTileStatus(int, int, GUESS_STATUS) - Method in class Controllers.MineSweeperController
This method determines the current status of the clicked tile, and based on the status parameter, assigns a new status to the tile.
updateTileStatus(int, int, GUESS_STATUS) - Method in class Models.MineSweeperBoard
Updates the tile to the indicated status parameter.
